Description:
Detects failed logon attempts from clients to MSSQL server.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), j4son
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: MSSQL Server Failed Logon
Query: sourcetype='windows-application' eql select * from _source_ where provider_name like '%mssql%' and eventid = '18456'
